     OPCODE   RD   A    B/IMM
ADD R1 = R2 + R3
Bin: 00000010 0001 0010 0011 000000000000
Hex: 02123000

ADD R4 = R1 + R2
Bin: 00000010 0100 0001 0010 000000000000
Hex: 02412000

ADDI R4 = R5 + 88
Bin: 01000010 0100 0101 0000000001011000
Hex: 42450058

ADDI R1 = R1 + 5
Bin: 01000010 0001 0001 0000000000000101
Hex: 42110005

NAND R6 = !(R7 & R8) 
Bin: 00010010 0110 0111 1000 000000000000
Hex: 12678000

LDADR R9 = PC+1 + 312
Bin: 11000010 1001 0000 0000000100111000
Hex: c2900138

SW MEM[R10 + 48] = R11 (R11 goes in DST spot)
Bin: 01001000 1011 1010 0000000000110000
Hex: 48ba0030

LW R12 = MEM[R13 + 8]
Bin: 01000110 1100 1101 0000000000001000
Hex: 46cd0008

BEQ IF R14 == R15 THEN PC = PC+1 - 30 (R14 goes in DST spot)
Bin: 00100001 1110 1111 1111111111100010
Hex: 21efffe2

HALT
Bin: 11111111 0000 0000 0000000000000000
Hex: ff000000

JALR RT R1, RL R2 (FLIP spots when assembled)
Bin: 10110011 0010 0001 0000000000000000
Hex: b3210000
